C2 [ U ] an understanding of or ability to decide about what is good or valuable, especially in connection with artistic or social activities: literary/musical/artistic/theatrical/aesthetic sensibility The author has applied a modern sensibility (= way of understanding things) to the social ideals of an earlier age. sensibilities [ plural ]
feelings: sensibilities of In a multicultural society we need to show respect for the sensibilities of others.
